result.arabic_text: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ
result.translation: [Say O Prophet], “Worship none except Allah[3]. Indeed, I am sent to you from Him, as a warner and bearer of glad tidings.
result.footnotes: [3] This passage succinctly captures the general purport of the Message: people should worship Allah Almighty alone.
